title: 2 Chainz Interview and more
itunes:title: 2 Chainz Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had 2 Chainz call in where he spoke about new music, political differences from Kanye West, connecting with Obama, Jay-Z verse and more. Also, we opened up the phone lines for Freaky Friday to see if our listeners ever had time where they had regrettable drunk sex and Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Zachary Langford one of the men that was apart of the killing of Ahmaud Arbery because he lied about his racist comments towards Ahmaud Arbery.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had 2 Chainz call in where he spoke about new music, political differences from Kanye West, connecting with Obama, Jay-Z verse and more. Also, we opened up the phone lines for Freaky Friday to see if our listeners ever had time where they had regrettable drunk sex and Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Zachary Langford one of the men that was apart of the killing of Ahmaud Arbery because he lied about his racist comments towards Ahmaud Arbery.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
